attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election in May-June.
attributes.additional_details: The government has failed the public and the nation. Within the time frame, it should be acceptable to call a GE around May-June time, as October-November is the Christmas Period. The PM should not delay, he should call a GE to end the chaos of his government and let the people decide.
attributes.background: The British Public does NOT want to wait till the second half of 2024 for a General Election. After 13 Years of chaos, the public has had enough. We want a General Election in May-June as the PM ruled out 2nd May as a GE.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658173
